src:
Pavkov nije doživeo prelom, pauza izvesna
07 Nov 2019, 09:57 by Nemanja
Fudbaler Crvene zvezde Milan Pavkov pauziraće zbog povrede skočnog zgloba koju je zadobio tokom jučerašnje utakmice sa Totenhemom, saznaje ,,Mocart sport“.
I dalje nije poznato koliko će pauza trajati, ali dobra vest po fudbalera i njegov klub jeste da je snimak pokazao da nije došlo do preloma.
Pavkov je nezgodno doskočio petnaestak minuta pre kraja susreta, kada je bilo 3:0 za vicešampiona Evrope.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Pavkov did not experience a fracture, the break is certain
07 Nov 2019, 09:57 by Nemanja
Red Star footballer Milan Pavkov will pause due to a hamstring injury he sustained during yesterday's game with Tottenham, Mozart Sport has learned.
It is still unknown how long the breaks will take, but the good news for the footballer and his club is that the footage showed that there was no break.
Pavkov awkwardly jumped fifteen minutes before the end of the match, when it was 3-0 for the European champion.
